languages.text:
Enemy immediately becomes an ally and gets an extra turn, then becomes an enemy again
Only works on enemies of difficulty IV or lower

traits.locale_text:
Enemy immediately becomes an ally and gets an extra turn, then becomes an enemy again
Only works on enemies of difficulty IV or lower

languages.text:
The affected enemy immediately turns into an ally and gains an extra turn. As soon as the extra turn ends, the target turns back into an enemy.
All enemies of difficulty tier V or above are immune to this effect.

traits.locale_text:
The affected enemy immediately turns into an ally and gains an extra turn. As soon as that turn ends, the target turns back into an enemy.
All enemies of difficulty tier V or above are immune to this effect.

The affected enemy immediately turns into an ally and gains an extra turn. As soon as that turn ends, the target turns back into an enemy.
All enemies of difficulty tier V or above are immune to this effect.

All enemies of difficulty tier V or above are immune to this effect.

All enemies of difficulty tier V or above are immune to this effect.

The affected enemy immediately turns into an ally and gains an extra turn. As soon as the extra turn ends, the target turns back into an enemy.
All enemies of difficulty tier V or above are immune to this effect.

languages.text:
Ставший целью противник немедленно превращается в союзника и получает дополнительный ход. По завершении этого хода цель снова становится противником.
Противники, чей ранг выше или равен V, обладают иммунитетом к этому эффекту.
languages.original_text:
The affected enemy immediately turns into an ally and gains an extra turn. As soon as the extra turn ends, the target turns back into an enemy.
All enemies of difficulty tier V or above are immune to this effect.

traits.locale_text:
Ставший целью противник немедленно превращается в союзника и получает дополнительный ход. По завершении этого хода цель снова становится противником.
Противники, чей ранг выше или равен V, обладают иммунитетом к этому эффекту.

Противники, чей ранг выше или равен V, обладают иммунитетом к этому эффекту.

languages.text:
El enemigo afectado se convierte de inmediato en aliado y recibe un turno extra. En cuanto este turno extra acabe, vuelve a convertirse en enemigo.
Todos los enemigos de nivel de desafío V o superior son inmunes a este efecto.
languages.original_text:
The affected enemy immediately turns into an ally and gains an extra turn. As soon as the extra turn ends, the target turns back into an enemy.
All enemies of difficulty tier V or above are immune to this effect.

traits.locale_text:

languages.text:
効果を受けた敵は瞬時に味方になって、さらに1ターン行動できる。そのターンが終了すると同時に、効果を受けた者は敵に戻る。
難易度レベル5以上の全ての敵はこの効果を受けない。
languages.original_text:
The affected enemy immediately turns into an ally and gains an extra turn. As soon as the extra turn ends, the target turns back into an enemy.
All enemies of difficulty tier V or above are immune to this effect.

traits.locale_text:

難易度レベル5以上の全ての敵はこの効果を受けない。

languages.text:
受影响的敌人会立刻变为盟友，同时获得一个额外回合。额外回合结束后，目标会再次变回敌人。
所有难度等级为V级或以上的敌人免疫此效果。
languages.original_text:
The affected enemy immediately turns into an ally and gains an extra turn. As soon as the extra turn ends, the target turns back into an enemy.
All enemies of difficulty tier V or above are immune to this effect.

traits.locale_text:

languages.text:
Der betroffene Gegner wird sofort zu einem Verbündeten und erhält einen zusätzlichen Zug. Nach diesem zusätzlichen Zug wird das Ziel wieder ein Gegner.
Alle Gegner der Schwierigkeitsstufe V oder höher sind gegen diesen Effekt immun.
languages.original_text:

All enemies of difficulty tier V or above are immune to this effect.

languages.text:
L'ennemi affecté se transforme immédiatement en allié et gagne un tour supplémentaire. Il redevient ennemi dès la fin de son tour supplémentaire.
Tous les ennemis de niveau V sont insensibles à cet effet.
languages.original_text:
The affected enemy immediately turns into an ally and gains an extra turn. As soon as the extra turn ends, the target turns back into an enemy.
All enemies of difficulty tier V or above are immune to this effect.

languages.text:
Etkilenen düşman, anında dost birime dönüşür ve bir ek tur kazanır. Hedef, ek tur biter bitmez tekrar düşmana dönüşür.
V veya üstü zorluk derecesine sahip düşmanlar, bu etkiye karşı bağışıktır.
languages.original_text:

All enemies of difficulty tier V or above are immune to this effect.
